original_text: So I continue to be patient and brave during all these troubles. I do that so that I can help the people that God has chosen to belong to him. I want God to save them too, because of what Christ Jesus has done for them. As a result, they will live with God for ever, in the beautiful place where he lives.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 택함 받은 자들을 위하여 모든 것을 참음은 그들도 그리스도 예수 안에 있는 구원을 영원한 영광과 함께 받게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: So I continue to be patient and brave
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 계속해서 인내하고 용감하게 있습니다

sentences.original_text: I do that so that I can help the people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 사람들을 도울 수 있도록 그렇게 합니다

sentences.original_text: that God has chosen to belong to him
I want God to save them too
because of what Christ Jesus has done for them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도 예수께서 그들을 위해 하신 일 때문에

sentences.original_text: As a result, they will live with God for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 그들은 영원히 하나님과 함께 살 것입니다

sentences.original_text: in the beautiful place where he lives
